roles.title: Member of Secretary-General's Advisory Body on Artificial Intelligence
quotes: 'Secretary-General's Advisory Body Members - Artificial Intelligence'.
'India has a unique vantage position on how AI could play out: UN Tech Envoy Amandeep Singh Gill'.
He has talked about the potential impact of AI on the Global South and about India's role in 'how AI could play out in the Global South.'
